## Summary

A clear, one-sentence description of the feature.

## Motivation

Why is this feature needed? What problem does it solve?

## Proposed Approach

How would you implement this? Which files/components would be affected?

## Alternatives Considered

Have you considered other approaches? Why is this one better?

## Additional Context

Mockups, diagrams, examples, or references.
